messages.content: What is the purpose of the Image Core node update in ComfyUI StabilityAI Suite?
The Image Core node in ComfyUI StabilityAI Suite has been updated to include a new true/false switch to activate styles and a corresponding selector.
How can you recover a lost image generated by the Creative Upscale node in ComfyUI StabilityAI Suite?

If your PC crashes or loses Internet connection during the creative upscale process, you can recover the lost image by copying the unique __id__ from the automatically generated __log.txt__ file and pasting it into the Creative Upscale Recover File node.
How can you add your API key in ComfyUI StabilityAI Suite?

You can add your API key in ComfyUI StabilityAI Suite by either setting the environment variable 'SAI_API_KEY', writing it to a file named 'sai_platform_key.txt', or entering it in the 'api_key_override' field of each node.
What are the other projects mentioned in the ComfyUI StabilityAI Suite documentation?
The other projects mentioned in the ComfyUI StabilityAI Suite documentation are ComfyUI Portrait Master and ComfyUI Prompt Composer.
How can you support the author of ComfyUI StabilityAI Suite?
You can support the author of ComfyUI StabilityAI Suite by making a small donation through the provided Ko-fi link or by purchasing their workflows from the given website.
What is the purpose of the true/false switch in the updated Image Core node?
The true/false switch in the updated Image Core node is used to activate styles.
Where can you find the unique __id__ for recovering lost images generated by the Creative Upscale node?
The unique __id__ for recovering lost images generated by the Creative Upscale node can be found in the automatically generated __log.txt__ file, which is saved in the same folder as the custom node.
